saadadb.resourcetest
Class SIAPQueryTester

java.lang.Object
  saadadb.resourcetest.SIAPQueryTester

public class SIAPQueryTester
extends java.lang.Object

This class build a collection and populate it with one pseudo image defined by a position and size. After is look for the area where a search box matches that image in various SIAP modes. 2 boxes are tested: one smaller than the image and one bigger

Author:
michel
